title: Best 85 Bacon Recipes - Creative Ways To Cook Bacon
body: <style type="text/css">#sidepanel{transform:translateX(0);visibility:visible;content-visibility:auto;}@media (max-width:425px){#sidepanel{width:7rem;max-width:7rem;}#sidepanel .nav-item,#sidepanel .nav-item a,#sidepanel footer a,#sidepanel div a,#sidepanel a span{font-size:10px;}#sidepanel ul,#sidepanel div{padding:0;margin:0;}#sidepanel button{display:none;}}</style>SearchMy RecipesSubscribeMembership BenefitsRecipesMealsHolidaysFood TrendsNewsKitchen Tips & ToolsAll VideosAbout UsNewsletterDelish ShopFollowOther EditionsYour Privacy ChoicesPrivacy NoticeTerms Of UseSkip to ContentRecipesDinnersSpring RecipesKitchen TipsNewsSubscribesign inSearchLemon Blueberry DessertsSpring SaladsCopycat Recipe IdeasBrunch RecipesSpring DinnersMeals & CookingRecipe Headquarters90 Wildly Delicious Bacon Recipes That Everyone Will Love90 Wildly Delicious Bacon Recipes That Everyone Will LoveThey're "bacon" us crazy!By Camille LowderUpdated: Apr 22, 2024Save ArticlePHOTO: LUCY SCHAEFFER; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONHere at Delish, we think bacon belongs on everythingâ€”it just brings that extra salt, crispy, and savory oomph to a dish. Bacon is an important part of a ton of our favorite apps, sides, mains, and even dessertsâ€”donâ€™t even get us started on how integral it is to the perfect breakfast. Check out our 90 best bacon recipes for ideas on what to do with it, but really, you can pretty much go hamâ€¦ er, bacon!First things first: If youâ€™re going to put it in everything, youâ€™re going to want your bacon to be the best it can be. We like a couple different cooking methods, so weâ€™ve included instructions and tips for success cooking it on the stove, in the oven, in the air fryer, and in the microwave. All will turn out delicious bacon, though some will be more chewy or more crispy, so experiment until you find which you like best.Then you can get to eating bacon for every meal of the day. Looking for a delicious savory breakfast? A bacon, egg, & cheese (BEC) is classic, but donâ€™t feel limited to just enjoying the combo on a sandwich. Check out our crispy hash brown-crusted bacon & cheddar quiche, our breakfast bombs, our copycat Cracker Barrel hash brown casserole, or our bacon weave breakfast tacos (with bacon instead of tortillas ðŸ˜‹) to see how much more you can do with the flavor combo. Want to enjoy bacon for lunch? Go for a classic sandwich, like a BLT or a club sandwich; a burger, like our bacon-beef 50/50 burger or our copycat Carlâ€™s Jr. Bacon Western Cheeseburger; or a hearty salad, like our garlic herb wedge salad or Snoop Doggâ€™s BBQ chicken Cobb (youâ€™ll flip over how he cooks his bacon). Need a salty, super-satisfying snack? Try our bacon avocado fries, our bacon-wrapped jalapeÃ±o poppers, our cheesy bacon spinach dip, or our BLT egglets. They make for great party apps too, and you might want to make extraâ€”theyâ€™ll go fast.Bacon isnâ€™t as good at carrying an entire meal as, say, steak or chicken, but it can take a dinner from good to GREAT. Check out our creamy asparagus bacon gnocchi, our coq au vin, our bacon-wrapped meatloaf, or our beef bourguignon to see what we mean. Bacon is even welcome in desserts. Maple bacon is a classic combo, of course, but bacon pairs with tons of other sweet flavors too. Try our bacon cannoli, our bacon weave sâ€™mores, our maple bacon cinnamon rolls, or our bacon chocolate roses to see how versatile it can be in sweets treats. Think of it like that little added sprinkle of flaky sea salt we often suggest atop desserts, and try adding bacon to all your faves.One final hot tip for bacon lovers: After cooking it (particularly on the stovetop), save that bacon grease! Itâ€™s cooking GOLD. Use it anywhere youâ€™d use oil for a massive flavor boost.1Classic BLTEmily Hlavac GreenA classic BLT doesn't need much to be good, but we added some special ingredients anyway! Here, we really elevate the bacon by brushing it with maple syrup and a little cayenne pepper, and spice up the mayo with some chili powder and paprika for a little kick.Get the Classic BLT recipe.2Best Baked BeansPHOTO: NICO SCHINCO; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONWhen it comes to year-round American cuisine, baked beans could quite possibly be looked at as one of the most classic side dishes. Theyâ€™re sweet, tangy, savory, and the best part, surprisingly easy to make. Not to mention, theyâ€™re a one-pot wonder!Get the Best baked Bean recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below3JalapeÃ±o Popper Chicken SkilletPHOTO: ANDREW BUI; FOOD STYLING: BARRETT WASHBURNEIf youâ€™re looking for ways to jazz up your average rotisserie chicken and get your family excited about mealtime, look no further than this skillet recipe. With all the flavors of the beloved bar appetizer, it can take a boring roasted bird to new levels of deliciousness.Get the JalapeÃ±o Popper Chicken Skillet recipe.4Maple Bacon Cinnamon RollsAndrew buiIs there anything better than the smell of freshly baked cinnamon rolls in the morning? We thought no, until THESE  came along. Loaded with candied maple bacon, these are a serious upgrade your brunch guests will flip over.Get the Maple Bacon Cinnamon Rolls recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below5Tuscan Chicken PastaPHOTO: ANDREW BUI; FOOD STYLING: MAKINZE GOREHere, we tossed crispy bacon, spinach, chicken breasts, and spaghetti in our creamy Tuscan-inspired sauce for a hearty chicken pasta dinner that's just as perfect for date night as it is for a simple and quick weeknight dinner.Get the Tuscan Chicken Pasta recipe.6Crispy Hash Brown-Crusted Bacon & Cheddar QuichePHOTO: RACHEL VANNI; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONThe classic combo of bacon, egg, and cheese gets a #glowup with this delectable breakfast recipe. Because here at Delish, the only thing better than a bacon, egg, and cheese is a bacon, egg, and cheese with hash browns!Get the Crispy Hash Brown-Crusted Bacon & Cheddar Quiche recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below7Bacon-Wrapped JalapeÃ±o PoppersPHOTO: DOAA ELKADY; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONJalapeÃ±o poppers are one of the easiest, most satisfying party apps. Mix cream cheese with pepper Jack, stuff it in jalapeÃ±os, and wrap it all in bacon. In the oven, the cheese gets hot and melty and the peppers mellow slightly. The combination is PERFECT.Get the Bacon-Wrapped JalapeÃ±o Poppers recipe.8Bacon Fried CabbagePHOTO: ANDREW BUI; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISON If you want to venture into the world of cabbage that goes beyond corned beef or coleslaw, try this fried cabbage on for size. Hearty and flavorful, it only requires 5 ingredients (if you don't count the salt and pepper). This simple recipe might just convert even the most ardent of cabbage haters.Get the Bacon Fried Cabbage recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below9Baked Brie PastaPHOTO: LUCY SCHAEFFER; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONIf the TikTok famous baked feta pasta is a tad salty for your taste or if youâ€™re ready to try something new, reach for a hunk of brie instead. This melty, brie-coated pasta has earthy mushrooms, sweet shallots, and smoky baconâ€”kind of like if feta pasta had a cool older cousin.Get the Baked Brie Pasta recipe.10Bacon Parm CrackersParker FeierbachThis is the easiest app to whip together (it even works in the air fryer!), and everyone will love it. All you need is 3 simple ingredients and around an hour to turn any gathering into a party.Get the Bacon Parm Crackers recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below11Tagliatelle With Bacon & MushroomsErik bernstein Sure, everyone loves pasta. But pasta + bacon + mushrooms? That's just out of control. Creamy and comforting, weâ€™re (over)confident this tagliatelle will become your fast friend.Get the Tagliatelle With Bacon & Mushrooms recipe.12Kentucky Hot Brown SlidersRACHEL VANNI PHOTOGRAPHY LLC F/SEvery sandwich is better in slider form, especially when it comes to the southern classic Kentucky hot brown. Just like the OG version, these are piled high with turkey breast, cheese sauce, crispy bacon, and juicy sliced tomatoes.Get the Kentucky Hot Brown Sliders recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below13Loaded Potato SkinsPHOTO: ROCKY LUTEN; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONWe expect nothing less than fully loaded from our potato skins. What does that mean to us? If it's topped with cheddar, sour cream, bacon, and scallions (or chives), it's loaded. Examples include (but are CERTAINLY not limited to): loaded mashed potatoes, loaded pickle chips, and loaded zucchini skins.Get the Loaded Potato Skins recipe.14Garlic Herb Wedge SaladAndrew buiWe attribute this salad's greatness to three things: 1) a homemade garlic confit and blue cheese dressing that will knock your socks off, 2) fresh herbs both in the dressing and as garnish, and 3) thick. cut. bacon.Get the Garlic Herb Wedge Salad recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below15Creamy Asparagus Bacon GnocchiPHOTO: ERIK BERNSTEIN; FOOD STYLING: SPENCER RICHARDSThis speedy one-pan dinner is 100% pure comfort. With chewy gnocchi, crisp-tender asparagus, and a light cream sauce imbued with smoky bacon, it's suspiciously delicious for a dish that takes well under an hour.Get the Creamy Asparagus Bacon Gnocchi recipe.16Breakfast BombsParker feierbachThese easy-to-make biscuit bombs are stuffed with all your favorite breakfast foodsâ€”scrambled eggs, crispy bacon, and CHEESE. You could make them in the oven, but they take less than half the time in your air fryer.Get the Breakfast Bombs recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below17Spinach-Stuffed Chicken BreastErik bernsteinHasselback your chicken by cutting shallow slits into your chicken breasts (don't cut all the way through!) and stuff each slit with bacon and a creamy spinach and artichoke filling.Get the Spinach-Stuffed Chicken Breast recipe.18Copycat Panera Green Goddess Cobb Salad With ChickenPHOTO: ANDREW BUI; FOOD STYLING: SPENCER RICHARDSPaneraâ€™s Cobb salad is like no other Cobb salad. With the green goddess dressing, and the classic Cobb toppings, like, hard-boiled eggs and crispy baconâ€”this salad always hits the spots when you need something hearty and filling, but still want to get your greens in.Get the Copycat Panera Green Goddess Cobb Salad With Chicken recipe. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below19Bacon-Wrapped DatesEmily hlavac green If you're unfamiliar with dates, it's time to familiarize yourself! The date's sweetness is the PERFECT counterpoint to crisp, salty bacon and creamy goat cheese. We guarantee these will fly off the platter when your guests have barely begun to arrive, so make extra.Get the Bacon-Wrapped Dates recipe.20Chicken DijonPHOTO: ERIK BERNSTEIN; FOOD STYLING: ERIKA JOYCEIn the vein of chicken scallopini and our fan fave one-pan chicken & gnocchi, this dish is an ultra-creamy affair with simple seasoning, best served over cooked rice, angel hair pasta, or crusty sourdough bread so that you have something to soak up every last bit of deliciousness.Get the Chicken Dijon recipe.Watch NextÂ Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowRecipe HeadquartersEnchilada CasseroleChicken FajitasMicheladaCaesar Salad DressingAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowMargarita6 Cookie Swaps For Your Banana PuddingLemon-Blueberry Brie BitesClassic MartiniBlueberry Cheesecake Icebox CakeAvocado Toast FocacciaGrilled Chicken BreastCacio E Pepe ChickenAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowNewsletterSubscribeManage SubscriptionAbout UsDelish Test KitchenMedia KitCommunity GuidelinesAdvertise With UsDelish Shop Product SupportOther Hearst SubscriptionsDelish Unlimited Membership SupportTurn off Web NotificationsA Part of Hearst Digital MediaWe may earn commission from links on this page, but we only recommend products we back.Â©2025 Hearst Magazine Media, Inc. Check out our 90 best bacon recipes for ideas on what to do with it, but really, you can pretty much go hamâ€¦ er, bacon!\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eFirst things first: If youâ€™re going to put it in everything, youâ€™re going to want your bacon to be the best it can be. We like a couple different cooking methods, so weâ€™ve included instructions and tips for success cooking it \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a38833517/how-to-cook-bacon-on-the-stove/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eon the stove\u003c/a\u003e, \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/a22502749/how-to-cook-bacon-in-the-oven-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ein the oven\u003c/a\u003e, in the \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a28141278/air-fryer-bacon-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eair fryer\u003c/a\u003e, and \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a27117027/microwave-bacon/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ein the microwave\u003c/a\u003e. All will turn out delicious bacon, though some will be more chewy or more crispy, so experiment until you find which you like best.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eThen you can get to eating bacon for every meal of the day. Looking for a delicious savory breakfast? A \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a34210871/breakfast-sandwich-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ebacon, egg, \u0026 cheese\u003c/a\u003e (BEC) is classic, but donâ€™t feel limited to just enjoying the combo on a sandwich. Check out our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a45714428/crispy-hash-brown-crusted-bacon-and-cheddar-quiche-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ecrispy hash brown-crusted bacon \u0026 cheddar quiche\u003c/a\u003e, our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/recipes/a51530/breakfast-bombs-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ebreakfast bombs\u003c/a\u003e, our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a38108810/cracker-barrel-hashbrown-casserole-copycat-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ecopycat Cracker Barrel hash brown casserole\u003c/a\u003e, or our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/recipes/a54272/bacon-weave-breakfast-tacos/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ebacon weave breakfast tacos\u003c/a\u003e (with bacon \u003cem\u003einstead\u003c/em\u003e of tortillas ðŸ˜‹) to see how much more you can do with the flavor combo. Want to enjoy bacon for lunch? Go for a classic \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/g1590/easy-lunch-sandwiches/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003esandwich\u003c/a\u003e, like a \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a27360555/classic-blt-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eBLT\u003c/a\u003e or a \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a32714107/club-sandwich-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eclub sandwich\u003c/a\u003e; a \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/g2729/best-burger-recipes/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eburger\u003c/a\u003e, like our\u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a27394951/bacon-burger-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003e bacon-beef 50/50 burger \u003c/a\u003eor our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a39540736/carls-jr-bacon-western-cheeseburger-copycat-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ecopycat Carlâ€™s Jr. Bacon Western Cheeseburger\u003c/a\u003e; or a hearty salad, like our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a35257243/wedge-salad-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003egarlic herb wedge salad\u003c/a\u003e or \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a39975305/snoop-dogg-bbq-chicken-cobb-salad-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eSnoop Doggâ€™s BBQ chicken Cobb\u003c/a\u003e (youâ€™ll flip over how he cooks his bacon). They make for great party apps too, and you might want to make extraâ€”theyâ€™ll go \u003cem\u003efast\u003c/em\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eBacon isnâ€™t as good at carrying an entire meal as, say, \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/g2991/weeknight-steak-dinners/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003esteak\u003c/a\u003e or \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/g2972/chicken-weeknight-dinners/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003echicken\u003c/a\u003e, but it \u003cem\u003ecan\u003c/em\u003e take a dinner from good to GREAT. We like a couple different cooking methods, so weâ€™ve included instructions and tips for success cooking it on the stove, in the oven, in the air fryer, and in the microwave. All will turn out delicious bacon, though some will be more chewy or more crispy, so experiment until you find which you like best.Then you can get to eating bacon for every meal of the day. Looking for a delicious savory breakfast? A bacon, egg, \u0026 cheese (BEC) is classic, but donâ€™t feel limited to just enjoying the combo on a sandwich. Maple bacon is a classic combo, of course, but bacon pairs with tons of other sweet flavors too.
